children.subject: hey, imo this shouldn't be pinned.

history.content:
We are a small group of researchers from the Berkeley EECS department, Berkeley School of Information, and Google Ethical AI. Currently, we are running a survey on how people use automated translation tools.

We are aiming to improve the current machine translation system to better serve: translation need in high-stake scenarios such as hospital, health care, and legal activities for International students/Immigrants.

Please help us shape the future translations tools by fulfilling this 10 min survey.

tinyurl.com/translate2020

If you are an international student or have friends/families encountering machine translation problems in high-stake scenarios(eg. seeking the medical need for COVID19, etc.), feel free to leave your email at the end of the survey so that we could reach out to you for further interviews with $25 - $50 compensation.

Thanks a lot!
history.subject: Survey: Understanding Automatic Machine Translation Need amid COVID19
